commandDescriptions.list: List all modules and their details
commandDescriptions.update: Update details of a specific module
commandDescriptions.reorder: Adjust the display order of modules in the sidebar

optionDescriptions.language: Language to use, default is en
optionDescriptions.username: Username required for authentication, will prompt if not provided
optionDescriptions.password: Password required for authentication, will prompt if not provided

delete.beforeProceed: Please review the following warnings before proceeding:

actionScope.title: Action Scope
actionScope.desc: This action will delete the frontend code of the selected module but will not remove backend or database components related to the module.

recoverability.title: Recoverability
recoverability.desc: This action will remove the module from the current working codebase but is not completely irreversible. If needed, the deleted code can still be recovered through Git history.

systemImpact.title: System Impact
systemImpact.desc: Deleting this module may affect other parts of the system that depend on it. Please ensure all related dependencies have been reviewed.

backupRecommendation.title: Backup Recommendation
backupRecommendation.desc: To avoid any disruptions, it is recommended to commit current changes and create a backup branch before proceeding.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.desc: Confirming this action indicates that you understand and accept all consequences of deleting this module.

dependencies.desc: Any functionality dependent on this module's frontend may fail, including routes, UI components, or related features.
dependencies.title: Dependencies

prompts.proceedConfirmation: Are you sure you want to proceed with the deletion process?
prompts.proceedConfirmation2: Please enter "{}" to continue the deletion process.
prompts.proceedConfirmation3: Are you sure you want to delete the module "{}"?
prompts.finalConfirmation: Final Confirmation: Are you really sure you want to delete this module?
prompts.proceedConfirmation4: Please enter the module name "{}" to confirm deletion.

OTP.sent: OTP has been sent to your email

invalid.OTP: Invalid OTP format, OTP must be a 6-digit number
